posts.post_content:
I want to buy a T206 Cobb red portrait. Must be a grade of 2 or higher. No Piedmont or Sweet Cap backs please. No ungraded versions please.  I am willing to pay $700 cash for the right card. If interested, please email me a scan to [url]william.biery@fmr.com[/url].

Thanks!
Cy's cards took good care of me!
